description:
Your To Do list -- anywhere! Check Mate is a web service that was made with retro devices in mind. It keeps your To Do list in a simple file, and provides a web client that you can use on virtually any web browser from 1997 through 2021, and now it has a first class webOS client! Get your hit of dopamine as you check off your daily tasks, with a delightful webOS experience. Everything you'd expect from a Mojo app is there, including swipe to delete, re-orderable tasks, and even a customizable sound scheme. And if you don't have your Pre or Touchpad handy, you can manage your To Do list on a modern computer or mobile device.

The hosted version of the service is provided by webOS Archive, at http://checkmate.wosa.link -- or you can host your own server on anything that can run PHP.
versionNote:
Version 1.0.0 - Initial public release. This version doesn't support creating a new account, so you'll have to visit the website to do that part, but everything else works in-app. I'll update soon to resolve this one missing piece of the experience...
Version 1.1.0 - Adds support for webOS Just Type task creation, enables quick complete or uncomplete by keeping checkmark partly visible, fixes sort bugs,
Version 1.2.0 - Adds the ability to create a new account from within the app
Version 1.2.1 - Support the new row feature of the Mojo list widget.
Version 1.2.2 - Now you can just start typing to create a new task! Also added ability to Copy notes to clipboard
Version 1.2.3 - Fix a bad keyboard handler bug that could prevent login.
Version 1.2.5 - Adds dark theme and supports move to new domain.
Version 1.2.6 - Move to new app domain. This update is required.
